tin.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a soft silver-white metal that is often used to cover and protect iron and steel. It is a chemical element: symbol Sn
tin.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a small metal container in which food or drink is sold
tin.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a metal container with a lid in which food can be stored
tin.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: a metal container in which food is cooked
tin.translation[0].definitions[4].defini: a metal container with a lid, in which paint, glue etc is sold
